title: Get help - give aid
creator_credit: Fillinger Films, American College of Emergency Physicians and Paul Fillinger
brief_description: Gives us an overview of what first aid to provide in a variety of emergency situations. Shows how to use the phone to contact emergency services; how to stop the flow of blood; how to give mouth-to-mouth resuscitation; how to help a person whose clothes are on fire and how to give aid to a person who is choking. NB THE PROCEDURE FOR FIRST AID FOR CHOKING IS NOT THE PROCEDURE RECOMMENDED IN AUSTRALIA.
